content: Ensure your phone remains charged when you need it the most with the rugged external battery pack. This 15,000 mAH battery pack is compatible with most major smartphones and features a tough exterior designed to stand up to just about anything.

Be ready for whatever comes your way while on the go with the traveler’s 21 multitool. This indispensable multitool features a compact design that carries 21 different tools ranging from three different types of screwdrivers to wrenches and other handy tools.

Immortalize your riveting social life as you keep a running log of all the high profile guests that have plopped down beside you with the couch guest book. Now your guests can leave a little something besides just their butt print on the cushion.

Storing your liqour in the freezer isn’t enough – only the freezable gel shot glasses will ensure your liquor remains icy cold as it makes its way to sucker punch your liver. Once frozen, these colorful shot glasses function as plastic ice cubes you can drink out of!

Set the night sky ablaze with a beautiful light spectacle as you release the eco colored wish lanterns. Upon lighting these pastel colored wish lanterns, they begin their graceful ascent into the heavens while simultaneously creating a beautiful star-filled sky.

Help prevent the spread of germs in your home by installing the touch free water faucet adapter. The touch free design allows you to turn on the faucet simply by placing your hands under the sensors – which works perfectly for washing dishes and doing other chores.

Quell your road rage with Buddhist like control as you channel positive energy from the dashboard Monk. No matter how bad the traffic or how uncooperative the weather is, the tiny Monk’s cheerful aura will bring serenity to your inner self.

Let Whiskers practice his wicked DJ skills while also keeping his nails sharp and trim with the cat scratch turntable. These turntable shaped scratching posts actually spin when your feline digs into them and will entertain both you and him for hours on end.

Braces yourselves – dinner is coming. Experience the grandeur and deliciousness of a Winterfell feast in your own home with help from the Game of Thrones cook book. This helpful guide provides you with everything you’ll need to know in order to throw an authentic feast.

Not even mother nature can get in the way of your favorite tunes when you play them using the all-terrain Bluetooth speaker. Designed to provide crisp sound in unpredictable environments, this compact and rugged speaker will deliver music in any type of environment.

Real whiskey drinkers have balls of steel – and use them to cool their drinks too! The stainless steel drink cooling balls will ensure your aged whiskey remains at an ideal drinking temperature without ruining the purity of the spirit with water, like regular ice would.

Cradle your precious beer like a mother kangaroo cradles her young joey by wearing the beer koozie necktie. This fashionable garment helps you maintain a professional demeanor at the office or company picnic while increasing your beer carrying capacity.

Get one step closer to downloading a car with the revolutionary desktop 3D printer. This professional quality printer integrates with the easy to use “Thingiverse” platform, allowing you to print out all kinds of unique items from the comfort of home.

Start your morning off right – by drinking warm liquid from a dick with this uniquely designed coffee mug. Perfect for the home or office, the ceramic mug’s humorous message will bring some much needed levity to your day.

Gain the knowledge you need to survive the inevitable apocalypse by studying the informative pages of the Zombie Survival Guide. From learning effective defense tactics to understanding the physiology and anatomy of zombies, your survival is all but guaranteed.

Experience a mini adrenaline rush from the comfort of home with the seated zip line kit. Forget about those lame tree houses or swing sets, they don’t even come close to providing the thrill that zipping across the yard suspended in mid-air can provide!

Get more use from your TV remote by popping open a fresh beer with the bottle opener remote control. The remote will easily operate all you electronics in addition to opening up your drink with the handy, heavy-duty bottle opener found at the side.

You can’t put a price on your phone’s safety. The 24 karat gold iPhone case keeps your smartphone protected while looking fabulous and will have everyone else looking at it with envy. After all, who needs a savings account with a phone this luxurious?

Live out your college dreams of wrestling with women in skimpy outfits with help from the bulk jello wrestling kit. Inside this magnificent kit you’ll find everything you need for the party of a lifetime. Just fill up the kiddie pool and unleash the bad decisions.

Create a dazzling star-filled sky in your bedroom every time you flick on the LED stars lamp. When turned on this compact lamp projects a mesmerizing view of the cosmos onto the walls of the room and creates a magical and soothing environment.

Take control of the community pool when you and your mateys equip yourselves with these pool noodle swords. These non-lethal and extremely fun pool toys comes with an ergonomically designed handle so you can wield the sword with extremely floppy accuracy.

Receive some major hipster points when you show up to the coffee shop with this leather book laptop cover. This distinguished cover disguises your modern laptop as an antique leather-bound novel to deter potential illiterate thieves.

Get some additional use out of your phone during important presentations by equipping it with the iPhone laser pointer. Once this small laser pointer is inserted into the headphone jack, it transforms into a fully functional laser point perfect for blinding co-workers!

Turn every announcement into a celebration by stating it with the banner shaped sticky notes. Whether you’ve bought the office a box of donuts or want a creative way of announcing you’re pregnant, these colorful notes will get your message across loud and clear.

Add some levity to your dull workday by keeping those TPS reports organized using these penguin shaped paper clips.  These novelty paper clips come molded in the shape of a playful and helpful penguin you can use for work or to play with.

Add a fruity tropical element to your favorite summertime drink with the pineapple ice cube tray. The silicone tray – shaped like a giant pineapple – makes up to a dozen tiny fruit shaped ice cubes that are perfect for any island themed cocktails.

Guarantee the kids get nightmares for the remainder of their childhood years by reading them a bedtime story written in the peeping horror notebook. It disguises your face as that of a rotting zombie corpse in addition to providing a handy place for taking notes.

Create a seedy ambiance in your cantina by illuminating it using the Boba Fett neon light. An ideal light source for any Star Wars fan, it comes shaped like the iconic helmet that the feared bounty hunter is famous for wearing.

There’ll be no catching you off guard after you read the Worst Case Scenario Survival book. After studying its informative pages, you’ll know how to make it out alive from any imaginable situation such as getting abducted by aliens or navigating a minefield.

Turn any arid environment into your personal oasis with the portable giant umbrella. When the sun’s blazing with all its might, this umbrella  equipped with side flaps and windows will keep you cool and protected against harmful UV rays.

The battery powered lawn mower will keep the yard perfectly trimmed without having to use any planet destroying fossil fuels. Rather than polluting the environment, this eco-friendly lawn mower runs for up to 70 minutes on a high-tech dual battery design.

Entertain your eyes as you keep track of time with the magnetic sand hourglass. Rather than traditional sand, you’ll be treated to an array of mind blowing shapes formed by the iron fillings slowly falling from the top end of the hourglass.

Make the images on your phone come to life with the smartphone 3D screen protector. Apart from shielding your delicate touchscreen, the protective film makes images appear as stunning 3D visuals without the need for any specialized glasses.

Escape the crowded shores by taking your picnic to the high seas with the floating island table. Once inflated, you and three friends will enjoy lounging above the ocean’s surface on spacious seats that are each connected to a bouncy yet firm table in the center.

Ensure your belongings stay dryer than the Sahara during a torrential downpour by storing them in the outdoor waterproof backpack. The fully welded seamless nylon construction keeps water from seeping through and reaching the contents inside.

Spend the day relaxing with a lovable woodland creature the next time you plop down on the Totoro sleeping bag. Styled to look like a giant Totoro, this over sized cushion makes the ideal spot for a reading nook or taking a light nap.

While other pets wither and die, the robotic fish is the one pet you can count on to to stand the test of time – even if you forget to feed it. As long as there’s juice in his batteries, this little guy will happily swim all day and night for your personal enjoyment.

Increase your chances of survival out in the wild with the indispensable pocket chainsaw. Its sturdy construction paired with the stainless steel teeth make this lightweight and portable saw a force to be reckoned with.

Acquire the deadly hand blades of your geeky dreams without the life changing adamantium injection surgery. These Wolverine style blades provide three razor sharp steel blades at your disposal – without the excruciating pain of having them come out you.

Keep your bar of soap from becoming all gross and mushy by storing it on the water draining soap holder. This cleverly functional design holds the bar at a sloping angle, allowing excess water to drain off, keeping the soap nice and dry.

titleEN: How To Survive A Sharknado Book
content: Learn the skills you need to thrive in the post-apocalyptic world of monsters with the How to Survive a Sharknado book. With the invaluable information found inside, you’ll be able to stay alive in dire situations such as a firenado or an attack by the Mothman.

Keep the party going into the wee hours of the morning with these glow stick bracelets. These vibrant bracelets come in every color under the neon rainbow and are guaranteed to shine bright for the entire duration of your drug riddled adventure!

Promote healthy eating while staying dry in stormy weather with the romaine lettuce head umbrella. This compact and lightweight novelty umbrella comes with an amusing lettuce graphic that creates the illusion you’re toting around an actual lettuce head.

Enjoy the benefits of a wireless keyboard without the hassle of needing batteries by upgrading to the solar powered wireless keyboard. Once this ultra-slim keyboard is charged by any type of UV light, it can last for up to three months in total darkness.

Stay safe while cruising through the streets at night with the LED bicycle wheel system. Apart from turning heads as you pedal down the road, these wheel mounted LEDs provide true 360 degree visibility while the back light doubles as a functional brake light.

See the world through the eyes of a tiny chameleon by using these oddly shaped chameleon vision goggles. Just like the color-changing reptiles, you’ll be able to look in different directions at once and even get to see who’s behind you thanks to the hidden side mirrors.

Let Sparky live life in the fast lane every time he goes for a doggy nap with the sports car pet bed. This bed places your best friend behind the wheel of his very own mid-life crisis sports car that he’ll love so much he finally might stop jumping up on the couch!

Keep yourself motivated while you train to become the next Michael Phelps with the underwater headphones. The earpieces clip on to your goggle’s rubber straps and won’t come loose as you swim back and forth – so you can go all out during your underwater workout.

Keep Mr. Whiskers looking slim and fabulous year round with the cat exercise wheel. Now instead of wasting his excess energy knocking stuff of the shelves, he’ll be able to burn it off in a productive way that helps keep him healthy.

Save your precious smartphone from a watery grave with the waterproof iPhone case. While encased within the tightly sealed sturdy plastic shell, your iPhone becomes impervious to water so you can avoid accidents or partake in some underwater photography.

Execute an impromptu fishing trip whenever the mood strikes with the inflatable fishing boat. Featuring a padded seat, adjustable backrest, and bottle holders – you can fish in utter comfort without having to spends thousands on an expensive boat.

Keep your valuables safe from potential thieves next time you hit the beach with the portable underground beach vault. Simple dig the vault into the sand and sit back and relax knowing your possessions will remain dry and hidden from strangers.

The 3D glasses contacts case are the premier way for movie buffs to store their contacts when not in use. The fun 3D glasses design keeps the lenses safe in the this compact, durable, and leak-proof case that features a snap lid and easy open button on the back.

If you think driving a Tumbler is hard, just wait until you try assembling one in LEGO form! This highly detailed Batman Tumbler will drive both comic and LEGO enthusiasts wild as they work on building their very own mini Tumbler – complete with Batman and Joker.

Keep your most valued wines and spirits safe from thirsty thieves with the combination wine bottle lock. Designed to fit most wine and liquor bottles, this stainless steel device ensures the bottle remains sealed until the four digit combination is entered.

Eating sushi can be tricky for land lovers – luckily the peg leg pirate chopsticks be here to help ye get a firm hold on those fancy treats of the sea. Old peg leg’s long and slim stems latch onto rolls  tightly, making them great for kids and novice sushi eaters.

Keep your drinks ice cold as you bake under the merciless sun with the drink cooling pool lounger. With two built-in armrest coolers and an insulated cup holder, you’ll never have to get out of the pool again to keep your buzz going.

Ensure Jr. thrives in today’s technology driven society by getting him started at a young age with the HTML for babies book. From start to finish, he’ll learn to recognize the visual patterns and symbols that make up the building blocks of the web.

Introduce your everyday mobile device to some subtle elegance by dressing it up with the rosewood iPhone skin. The skin is finished in a reddish hue which brings out the radiant tones of the natural rosewood, giving your iPhone an air of sophistication.

Take a trip down memory lane every time you go to check the time with the gold Mickey Mouse pocket watch. This nostalgic piece is encased by a 32mm metal frame and displays a joyful 1930s Mickey whose pose changes as his hands make their way around.

If MacGyver owned an iPhone, this is the case he would use. While the case conforms to the iPhone’s sleek and slender profile, it contains 22 cleverly concealed tools you can pull out with the swipe of a finger, so you can tackle any situation.

Give your backyard a quick facelift by creating a charming ambiance with the pre-lit metal sphere. This lovely light fixture has 15″ diameter, contains over 100 twinkle lights, and can hang on practically any structure close to a light fixture for maximum convenience.

Dodge through traffic like a skilled warrior when you whiz through sluggish cars with help from the Samurai sword gear stick. As if driving a manual transmission vehicle wasn’t fun enough, this 10.5″ shift knob will make your daily commute that much more exciting.

Stand out from the rest of the attention whores at the rave/club when you show up wearing the sound reactive LED DJ mask. Music will reach a whole new level as your face begins to react to the brain melting beats being dropped.

Get professional action footage of your stunt work without hiring an expensive Hollywood crew with the auto follow GoPro quadrocopter drone. This agile robot safely mounts your camera and follows you using a special tracking device you wear.

Accommodate every single one of your electronic devices simultaneously with the pivoting power strip. Unlike standard power strips models, the pivoting strip bends and articulates so those big and clunky laptop and smartphone chargers can all fit.

Create delicious, all natural snacks from the comfort of home with the Popsicle mold bags. These specially designed bags are manufactured with a durable bottom seal to prevent leakage – allowing you to turn your favorite ingredients into frozen snacks.

titleEN: Blueprints For Making Cool Stuff Book
content: Get your creative juices flowing by occupying your time with the “Blueprints For Making Cool Stuff” book. This informative read features easy to follow instructions that teach you how to make everything from bunk bed communicators to other wacky gadgets.

Set up an impromptu shower anywhere there’s a hose using the inverted outdoor shower. Upon being connected, you simply need to step over the non-slip wooden platform to allow the 22 jet sprays to blast streams of water up to 6 feet in the air.

Don’t let lukewarm bubbly potentially ruin your special night – by using the ice bottle chiller mold your wine or champagne will always be perfectly chilled. This giant ice cube will conform to the shape of your bottle, keeping it chilled all night long.

Stay classy while you enjoy some playtime with the Anchor Man LEGO action figure. Dressed in a suit so fine that it makes Sinatra look like a common hobo, Mr. Burgundy is definitely going to bring a little fun and a whole lot of spunk to LEGO San Diego.

Keep unwanted critters from wandering into your home with the smartkey enabled dog door. Unlike old fashioned dog doors, this high tech version equips your doggy with a specialized key which emits a signal that opens the door when they’re ready to come in.

Keep garments looking downright spiffy in between cleanings with the dry cleaning clothes machine. This revolutionary machine will cut your dry cleaning bill in half by refreshing all your dry-clean-only clothes without having to use an actual dry cleaning service.

Kick your mischievous side into high gear by pestering co-workers and classmates with the catapult pencil. When you’re not scribbling down  notes, the pencil’s unique shape allows you to commandeer it as a weapon of pure mayhem.

Put your deductive skills to the test with this Clue board game. It’s the mystery you love to solve – with a twist! The classic mansion has received a 21st century face lift with new weapons and updated floor plans – in addition to a brand new boardwalk setting!

Laugh at the misfortune of children by witnessing their horrible attempts at creativity by reading  the Crappy Children’s Art Book. This hilarious book will have you in stitches with pages full of failed children’s drawings along with brutally harsh criticisms of the botched art.

Take your jello shots from the dorm room to the black tie event with aid from the gourmet jello shots recipe book. The book provides detailed instructions and vivid imagery that show you exactly how to whip up some sophisticated, alcohol infused jello shots.

Keep your home on the cutting edge of technology with the modern LED doorbell. The updated design of this modern doorbell is crafted from an aluminum frame and is accented with a bright LED that creates an eye-catching effect that adds style to any home.

Turn any floor into your personal air hockey arena with the hover soccer puck. This over-sized puck gracefully glides over the floor so as not to scratch it, and features a special rubber bumper to improve rebounding and keep nearby furniture mostly damage free.

Let your little bundle of joy experience the finer things in life from day one with the diamond studded pacifier. Why waste your money saving for a college fund when your baby can suck on a silicone nipple surrounded by an opulent white gold and diamond finish?

Become the most inebriated bastard at the party by chasing every shot with a pint of cold beer by using this beer-shot glass. Although the glass’s nonsensical design may not prove to convenient when drinking, it’ll impress your fellow party people.

Experience an unparalleled view of Neptune’s vast kingdom by exploring it in the foldable clear kayak. The military grade urethane skin, combined with the sturdy carbon kevlar frame make this kayak ideal for exploring the transparent tropical waters.

Take Spidey’s high-flying antics to new heights with the Spider-Man kite. Spidey strikes an action pose as he takes to the skies in this 35″ x 53″ kite that’ll make you the happiest geek since Benjamin Franklin discovered the nature of lightning and electricity!

Keep your pool so clean you could drink from it when you put the robotic pool cleaner on the job. This busy body is always on the move; two powerful motors not only clean the floor and walls, but also simultaneously filter the water.

Enjoy a five star breakfast from the comfort of your own home by using the rolled omelet pan to prepare it. This specialized pan comes covered in a non-stick coating and features a unique shaped surface that makes preparing gourmet omelets a breeze.

All you need to create a lovely iridescent environment in your backyard are some glow in the dark pebbles. Made from poly resin material, theses durable pebbles are ideal for year round use and glow for up to three hours after exposure to sunlight.

Keep all the nighttime demons away from your domicile when the Diablo night light is watching over you. Forged in the deepest reaches of Hell, the Diablo night light will shine bright to make sure any wandering demons scurry far away while you slumber.

Boost your blood sugar level higher than Anakin’s midichlorian count when you eat munchies crafted with the Star Wars baking molds. Great for bakers of all ages, these molds come in the shape of your favorite Star Wars characters such as Lord Vader and Yoda.

Make your backyard area come to life during the night with the garden mood light balls. Each waterproof orb is completely buoyant and can be set to one of seven vibrant colors so they’ll always match the motif you have in mind.

Turn your kitchen into your very own personal self-serve ice cream bar with the miniature ice cream sandwich maker. With three different molds to choose from, you’ll be able to custom build your perfect ice cream sandwich – bring on the calories!

Add some visual magic to the atmosphere by lighting the color tiki torch flames at your next nighttime shindig. The easy to light canister burns bright with a vibrant colorful flame that is great for giving the surrounding a little extra character.

Set up an impromptu movie theater in your backyard with the inflatable jumbo screen. Upon inflation, your guests will be treated to a massive 173 inch screen that lets you appreciate movies and sporting events while your fingers get all pruney.

Help kids – and some adults – tell time with greater ease with the light up word clock. While traditional analog clocks can confuse the dimwitted, the written number face of this light up clock gives you the time in an easy to read and classy display.

Always be prepared when trudging through unforgiving terrain by bringing along the inflatable car jack. With the inflatable jack on board,  you’ll be able to quickly change a flat in sandy or muddy roads where a conventional jack simply won’t work.

Liven up the bathroom decor with the smashing Nigel Thornberry shower curtain. With a little elbow grease, you’ll be able to transform any plain shower curtain with Nigel Thornberry’s red-headed mug bathing right alongside you – simply splashing!

Practice your aim while you wait for your clothes to dry by hanging them up with the duck target clothes pegs. Apart from looking adorable, these brightly colored duck pegs safely secure the laundry onto the line so not a single article of clothing will fall off or fly away.

Let your favorite droid guide you into the future of typing with the R2-D2 keyboard projector. Once R2 gets into position, he can emit a laser keyboard onto any surface you place him, allowing you to type virtually anywhere and complete your assignments in record time.

With the robotic lawn mower you’ll be able to keep your lawn perfectly manicured without even having to lift a finger. Technology has finally made it possible to sit back and relax as this diligent compact robot tirelessly runs up and down your freshly mowed lawn.

Turn any parking spot into your personal BBQ pit with the towing hitch tailgating grill. This compact unit conveniently mounts to your truck and features a reliable push button ignition, alongside tables and everything you need to cook an extravagant feast.

Convert any spot in the world into the ultimate laser tag arena using just your smartphone and the NERF laser tag gun. This lightweight accessory works with your phone and lets you set up massive multi-player battles at anytime and any location.
